name: Chicken Against Nation
description:
Chicken against nation is a game about a chicken ... against the army.

You're the chicken and you have superpowers : You can fire huge lasers, cast explosions, destroy them all !

I'd like to add loots and levels to the game, I think it could be fun.

Here are the inputs :

Mouse/Right stick : Move camera

WASD / Left stick : Move chicken

Space / R2 / RT / X / A (held) : Prepare jump, hang over (in air)

Left mouse button / L2 / LT : Shoot Acorn

Left Shift / Right click (joystick) : Dash

E / R1 / RB : Laser

A / L1 / LB  (hold) : Prepare explosion (seems to be broken on Keyboard, use a PS4 / XBox controller if you want to be able to charge explosions)
